author: IGN
description:
Join stars Chris Hemsworth, Halle Berry, and Mark Ruffalo for a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of the upcoming film, Crime 101. The movie also stars Barry Keoghan, Monica Barbaro, Corey Hawkins, Jennifer Jason Leigh, and Nick Nolte.

Set against the sun-bleached grit of Los Angeles, Crime 101 weaves the tale of an elusive jewel thief (Chris Hemsworth) whose string of heists along the 101 freeway have mystified police. When he eyes the score of a lifetime, his path crosses that of a disillusioned insurance broker (Halle Berry) who is facing her own crossroads. Convinced he has found a pattern, a relentless detective (Mark Ruffalo) is closing in, raising the stakes even higher. As the heist approaches, the line between hunter and hunted begins to blur, and all three are faced with life-defining choices–and the realization that there can be no turning back.

Crime 101 is produced by Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Derrin Schlesinger, Dimitri Doganis, Bart Layton, Shane Salerno, Chris He
title: Crime 101 - Official Behind-the-Scenes Video (2026) Chris Hemsworth, Halle Berry, Mark Ruffalo

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Zelda series producer Eiji Aonuma has commented on the collaboration between Koei Tecmo and Nintendo on the Hyrule Warriors games. Aonuma said that while he hoped the next main series Zelda game would be the Switch 2's first, some elements from Age of Imprisonment did inspire parts of his upcoming game. In Xbox news, the actor who portrayed Joanna Dark in the cancelled Perfect Dark reboot said she did 'entire chapters' of mocap for the game. She confirmed there was a plan to salvage a 'slimmed' down version, but ultimate the project was cancelled. And finally, the upcoming Honda Afeela car will be able to remotely play PlayStation 5 consoles, provided you have a PS5 turned on at home, similar to how the PlayStation Portal's remote play works.. The upcoming EV, produced in collaboration with Sony, is up for pre-order now for the low price of $89,900.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Zelda Producer Says Hyrule Warriors Inspired Elements of Next Main Series Game - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Join the development team of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes for a behind-the-scenes look at the gameplay, enemies, and more from this expansion for the first-person action-adventure game. Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

In Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes, play as So’lek, a Na’vi warrior who has found solace with the Sarentu. Just as peace settles over the Western Frontier, a new threat rises: the RDA, now allied with the Ash clan, who are ruthless Na’vi bent on annihilation. Ambushed and left for dead, So’lek awakens to a scorched land and his new-found family scattered. With new third-person gameplay, embark on So’lek’s journey as he vows to find his family and exact revenge on those who wronged him.
title: Avatar Frontiers of Pandora: From the Ashes - Official New Enemies and Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Version 1.0 of Eldegard (formerly known as Legacy: Steel & Sorcery) will be available on Steam on January 21, 2026. Watch the Eldegard release date trailer for this extraction-RPG.

Picking from iconic fantasy classes including Warrior, Rogue or Wizard, Eldegarde players can dive into a world of magic and steel, battling monsters and knights, as well as other players, through verdant fields, deep woods, and sinister crypts in order to find incredible loot and extract safely.

Eldegarde’s 1.0 launch also introduces a PvE mode, allowing more casual players to jump into the classic pulp fantasy-inspired world of Eldegarde, learning its combat mechanics and map intricacies without the threat of other players.
title: Eldegarde - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Based on Donald E. Westlake's "The Ax" No Other Choice follows Man-Su (Lee Byung Hun) on his desperate hunt for a new job after being abruptly laid off from the paper company he served for 25 years.
Experience it in IMAX one night only on December 8.
title: No Other Choice - Official Trailer (2025) Lee Byung-hun, Son Ye-jin

author: IGN
description: The Commodore 64 Ultimate is an incredible retro revival of the world's all-time best selling personal computer. Its modern additions are all positive and don't take anything away from the genuineness of its 8-bit experience. This is the piece of hardware to which all future retro-revivals should aspire.
title: Commodore 64 Ultimate Review

author: IGN
description: Magical Blush is a top-down action-adventure where fast-paced elemental combat meets Metroidvania-style exploration. Chain spell combos, exploit elemental weaknesses, rescue survivors, and team up in local co-op as you battle the powerful Elemental Lords and explore the wondrous world of Wyn. Magical Blush will be available on PC.
title: Magical Blush - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: Assigned to station 65, your role as employee 100411 will be to serve and sell products to the people, exercising the controls the state deems necessary to keep the population in line. Watch The State of Nowhere trailer for this Dystopian satire simulation game. The State of Nowhere will be available on PC in Q1 2026.
title: The State of Nowhere - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description: Mariachi Legends is a brutal, pixel art, combat-oriented Metroidvania set in the heart of Mexico.You play as Pablo Cruz, a detective who has agreed to a deal with Death herself. She has given Pablo the ability to transform into the mighty La Sombra allowing him to fight back against evil. Get another look at Mariachi Legends in this new trailer. Mariachi Legends will be available on PC (Steam), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2026.
title: Mariachi Legends - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a closer look at Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined in this latest trailer for the upcoming RPG remake. Learn about the beginning of your journey and get a peek at some of the adventures that await in this remake of the classic RPG. Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC on February 5, 2026.

#IGN #gaming
title: Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined - Official 'Adventure Log Part 1' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tour the icy lands and take a look at gameplay from ARK: Lost Colony in this launch trailer for the story-driven expansion for ARK: Survival Ascended. ARK: Lost Colony introduces a vast frozen world spanning seven distinct biomes, more than a dozen new creatures, the debut of Thrall Mastery, and a cinematic story blending MAPPA-produced hand-drawn anime storytelling along with Unreal Engine 5 'Metahuman' cinematics. 

The ARK: Lost Colony's cast includes Michelle Yeoh as formidable warrior "Meiyin", and Karl Urban (The Boys, Dredd, The Lord of the Rings) as veteran survivor “Bob,” now fully redesigned in Urban’s likeness. The ARK: Lost Colony expansion is available now on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #ARK #LostColony
title: ARK: Lost Colony - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
2025 provided a fantastic array of different video games. We’ve survived and extracted from the robot-ruled battlefields of Arc Raiders, adventured across the medieval lands of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, and established mind-expanding exhibitions in Two Point Museum. We helped Keeper’s sentient lighthouse solve puzzles, and unearthed the secrets buried in Atomfall’s eerie England. But which of the year’s many different video games is worthy of being crowned the very best of 2025?

Every December, the IGN team considers all the games they’ve collectively played and reviewed across the year, and votes on which one they think is the greatest of them all. Which one is the “Game of the Year”? Sometimes that choice is incredibly difficult. Other years, it’s easy. 2025 was the latter, with our winner securing almost three-quarters of the vote. But what is that near-universally admired game? That’s what we’re here to reveal.

#IGN #GameOfTheYear2025 #Gaming2025
title: The Best Game of 2025

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Dark Angels sub-faction and see them in action in this latest Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 trailer for the upcoming sci-fi real-time strategy game. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 will be available on PC in 2026.

The secretive Dark Angels descend during the Blood Ravens’ hour of need, bringing their ruthless precision and relentless discipline to the battlefields of Kronus. Two Space Marine Chapters crash into battle, to purge the Xenos threat.

#IGN #DawnOfWar4 #Warhammer40K
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 - Official 'Sons of Caliban' Dark Angels Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for The Breadwinner, an upcoming family comedy movie starring Nate Bargatze, Mandy Moore, Colin Jost, Zach Cherry, Martin Herlihy, Kate Berlant, with Kumail Nanjiani and Will Forte.

The Breadwinner is a family comedy that follows the misadventures of Nate Wilcox (Nate Bargatze), whose wife Katie (Mandy Moore) lands a once-in-a-lifetime deal on Shark Tank that takes her on a prolonged business trip - and now the lifelong breadwinner has to fend for his family as a first-time stay-at-home dad. With three young daughters and little experience handling their day-to-day needs, Nate finds out quickly that running the household is the toughest gig he’s ever had.

The Breadwinner is produced by Jeremy Latcham, Nate Bargatze, and Dan Lagana. JoAnn Perritano, Michael Musgrave, and Tyler Zacharia serve as executive producers. It is written by Nate Bargatze & Dan Lagana.

The Breadwinner, directed by Eric Appel, opens in theaters on March 13, 2026.

#IGN #TheBreadwinner #Co
title: The Breadwinner - Official Trailer (2026) Nate Bargatze, Mandy Moore, Zach Cherry

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Routine! 

Routine is sci-fi horror game set in a retro-analogue future inspired by 80s technology. Creep around a seemingly abandoned lunar station as you piece together the mystery as to what happened at the facility. 

Routine is available now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, and Steam.

#IGN #Routine #Horror
title: Routine - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Bleach comes to Fortnite! 

Play as Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime and Uryu in this latest collaboration!

#Fortnite #Bleach #IGN
title: Fortnite - Official Bleach Collaboration Trailer

description:
They may not have AAA marketing budgets, but these three upcoming indie releases are well worth your attention. Whether a gothic roguevania, cosy cafe manager, or cutesy life sim is more up your street, check out our picks to stay Indie Loop.

Sponsored by Soft Source, XD Games and Radic Creative
title: Three Fresh Indie Games To Add To Your Playlist: Indie Loop

author: IGN
description:
Timothée Chalamet delivers what might be the best performance of his career in Marty Supreme, A24’s new table tennis sports film from director Josh Safdie, 1/2 of the Safdie Brothers duo behind movies Uncut Gems and Good Time. 

This Marty Supreme review breaks down everything you need to know from the textbook Safdie chaotic storytelling to the standout supporting roles by Gwyneth Paltrow, Tyler, the Creator, and Shark Tank’s Mr. Wonderful himself, Kevin O’Leary.

Is Marty Supreme an early contender for Best Picture? Is it as good as other Safdie Brothers movies like Good Time and Uncut Gems? Is this the best A24 movie of the year? Yeah, it’s that good. IGN’s Michael Calabro breaks it all down, so check our Marty Supreme movie review.

For more on the Safdie Brothers, be sure to check out our review for Benny Safdie’s Samshing Machine:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S0mBhG2teL0

For everthing else Timothee Chalamet and A24, keep it locked to IGN.
title: Marty Supreme Review

author: IGN
description: Join the development team at MintRocket for a deep dive into Dave the Diver's upcoming In The Jungle DLC, a recap of 2025, and what's in store for the RPG adventure game. The new video showcases gameplay and systems of the In The Jungle DLC for Dave the Diver and news of the game's mobile release.
title: Dave the Diver - Official In The Jungle DLC Overview and Developer Update

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. On the last NGCW of the year, we look back at 2025 and pick what we think were the "most next-gen games" of the year. We're probably past the 'halfway point' for this generation so we should be seeing some of the best-looking games the PS5 and Xbox Series X can run, and we weren't disappointed. Battlefield 6 and Death Stranding 2 showcased what photorealism can look like on current consoles, while games like Keeper and Ghost of Yōtei were highlights in creative art direction. What do you think were some of the best-looking games of the year? Let us know in the comments. And we also have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com

00:09 Intro
00:38 Doom: The Dark Ages
02:33 Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
05:04 Mafia: The Old Country
07:39 Assassin's Creed Shadows
09:34 Ghost of Yōtei
12:14 Routine
14:26 Battlefield 6
16:04 Keeper
18:55 Poll results
21:52 Outro

#IGN #gaming
title: The Most Next-Gen Games of 2025 - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description: Meet Winner Island Trafalgar Law, and see this Red Element / Runner character in action in this latest One Piece: Bounty Rush trailer for the action game. Winner Island Trafalgar Law is a Runner who can instantly capture Treasure under certain conditions. A successful counter while capturing Treasure moves him to the furthest enemy Treasure Area, then attacks his previous location. One Piece: Bounty Rush is available now on PC and mobile.
title: One Piece: Bounty Rush - Official Winner Island Trafalgar Law Trailer
